text:
I was going to say.  Lady Maria is quite a thrill but you’ve still got a huge task ahead.

Good luck, hoonter!

Dear god yes.  I bought the first one when the remaster came out and got hooked.  

I haven’t played 2 yet but I don’t think you can really go wrong with either 1 or 3.  Overall I’d say I like 3 a bit more and think it’s better overall, but both are stellar.  

If you try either and enjoy the souls formula consider giving Bloodborne a try also.
